title: Brassica alba
Vernacular name:
English- yellow or white mustard
Hindi-safed rai
Gujarati-Rai
Chemical Constituents: para-hydroxybenzyl isothiocyanate (p-HBITC) and other mustard flavor compounds
Therapeutic uses: Used in poultices for acute local pain, pneumonia, bronchitis, and other diseases of the resiratory organs.
